macro.name: NELM
macro.description: Number of elements in sample data. Defaults to 1000

macro.name: POWER_MIN_VOLT
macro.description: Voltage value (in kV) to determine when the separator is off. Defaults to 2

macro.name: WINDOWSIZE
macro.description: Number of seconds in moving window. Defaults to 600

macro.name: MAXUNSTBL
macro.description: Maximum number of seconds allowed out of stability before alarm. Defaults to 30
